header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 130, page 100, line 16, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(ba) require information to be provided in a form that is clear and easy to understand;”

text.quote: 000: Clause 130, page 100, line 18, leave out from “information” to “about” in line 23
000: Clause 130, page 100, line 24, after “terms” insert “to be provided”
000: Clause 130, page 100, line 24, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) make provision about the way in which information is to be provided, which may in particular require information to be provided—
text.IndentTwo: (i) by means of a code or otherwise using a format readable by an electronic device, or
(ii) in a way which facilitates processing of the information by means of an electronic device.”
